verbs.description: SINGAPORE -- [ARGM-TMP: Newly] [V: released] [ARG1: video footage] from North Korean state media shows President Donald Trump returning a salute to a North Korean military general during this week 's summit in Singapore , an extraordinary display of respect from a U.S. president to a top officer of a hostile regime .
